thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I have a Porsche 4x4 and struggled to find mobile tyre companies that fit the size. Not only were they available with tyres on the drive they were fitted next day and such a reasonable price in comparison to everywhere else. The service was exceptional - A lovely lady rang me to confirm the booking and I then I had a guy called Josh arrive who had to change the tyres in darkness, freezing rain that then turned into snow. My time slot was 3:30-5:30 and he arrived at 3:45, did it so quickly and couldn't of been more friendly and professional. This is by far the best service I have experienced in a long time. Thank you very much.
